body_html: I reinstall Anaconda to get rid of CUDA 8, and find that there is no cuda* in /home/zqk/anaconda2/pkgs/ after I run find / -name 'libcuda*'again , but it still warning that I don't have GPU support .I don't know why it still have warn, thank you

body: I reinstall Anaconda to get rid of CUDA 8, and find that there is no cuda* in `/home/zqk/anaconda2/pkgs/` after I run `find / -name 'libcuda*'`again , but it still warning that I don't have GPU support .I don't know why it still have warn, thank you
